name: cac-demat-monorepo
description: Scripts racine pour orchestrer les releases NodeJS & NativePHP

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:native
scripts.release: npm run release:node && npm run release:native
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run release
